overview: Prerequisites for the core subjects in the Diploma Programme specialisation:
1. EDUC90333 Introduction to the IB is a prerequisite for EDUC90332 Curriculum Frameworks in the IB DP
2. EDUC90331 Assessment & Reporting in the IB is a prerequisite for EDUC90330 IB DP Advanced

Structure: Completion of all of the following subjects:

Structure.EDUC90332: Curriculum Frameworks in the IB DP Credits
Structure.EDUC90331: Assessment & Reporting in the IB Credits
